Concept.Comments: Before saving a new preset the user has to select the appropriate application
Concept.String: Please, select the application before saving.

Concept.Comments: Before saving a new preset the user has to create a group with at least 1 icon.
Concept.String: Please, add one or more icons before saving.

Concept.Comments: Action available to trackball when arrow is selected
Action available to trackball when move is selected
Message displayed when the user enters in Exam review or Archive Review to inform that the modification on Body mark won't be saved
Concept.String: Modification on Body mark won't be saved
